engagement_trace_gap.issue: No engagement-trace-archive.json exists. E sessions overwrite engagement-trace.json each session. verify-e-artifacts.mjs checks for trace entries by session number but only finds the most recent session.
engagement_trace_gap.impact: Artifact verification produces false failures for all but the latest E session. A#83 reported 100% artifact compliance but was checking intel archives (which work correctly) — trace checks may not have been running or were coincidentally passing for the latest session.
engagement_trace_gap.recommendation: Add engagement-trace archiving (similar to intel archiving) or update verify-e-artifacts.mjs to only check the most recent E session's trace data.

infrastructure.verdict: MOSTLY HEALTHY - Trace archive gap is a structural issue requiring B session fix

critical_issues.description: a83-1 STALE (2nd audit): WETH→ETH unwrap blocker unresolved for d044. No progress since B#319 (s1122, 9 sessions ago). wq-283 blocked. HiveMind participation completely stalled.
critical_issues.recommendation: Create work-queue item for B session to investigate relay services or smart wallet migration for WETH→ETH unwrap

critical_issues.description: a83-3 STALE (2nd audit): Brainstorming pipeline depleted — only 2 ideas remaining, no new ideas generated since s1120 (11 sessions). R sessions not fulfilling replenishment mandate.
critical_issues.recommendation: R sessions should add 2-3 new ideas per session per BRIEFING.md cycle. Queue has pending items so not blocking, but pipeline will stall.

recommended_actions.description: Investigate WETH→ETH unwrap options for d044
recommended_actions.action: B session should investigate: (1) relay services like Permit2/Gelato for gasless unwrap, (2) smart wallet migration (Coinbase Smart Wallet for gasless ops), (3) find a faucet or bridge that provides small ETH for gas. This is the only remaining blocker for HiveMind participation.

recommended_actions.description: Add engagement-trace archiving to post-session hooks
recommended_actions.action: E sessions write engagement-trace.json but it gets overwritten each session. Intel has an archive mechanism (engagement-intel-archive.json). Same pattern needed for trace: post-session hook appends trace entries to engagement-trace-archive.json. Without this, verify-e-artifacts.mjs produces false failures for all but the most recent E session.

recommended_actions.description: R sessions must replenish brainstorming ideas
recommended_actions.action: BRAINSTORMING.md has only 2 active ideas for 11+ sessions. R sessions should generate 2-3 new ideas per session. Queue has 2 pending intel-auto items but brainstorming pipeline is a separate input channel that's dried up.
